name: Hunyuan3D v2 Turbo - Image to 3D
description: Hunyuan3D V2 Turbo is a new model that generate a 3D model from a single image in ~2.5 minutes. It produces good quality geometry and textures, and it is more robust to different camera angles and object poses.

image.description: URL of image to use while generating the 3D model

seed.description: The same seed and the same prompt given to the same version of the model will output the same output every time

number_of_steps.description: Number of inference steps to perform

shape_only.description: If set false, textured mesh will be generated and the price charged would be 3 times that of shape only
